relnotes.name: Agenda Versit Plugin
relnotes.purpose: The plug-in library used by the Calendar component to interact with Versit, to provide vCalendar v1.0 standard support

preq.title: Improved Agenda interoperability with Exchange and Notes servers

relnotes.preq: The new agnversit2 component has been created for configuring to the new agnversit changes in vFuture.
